foggy_heavy_freezing_night: Foggy cold night means reading a good book before bed
foggy_light_hot_morning: Warm tropical mist. Early walk or outdoor breakfast in humidity.
foggy_light_hot_noon: Hot humid fog - seek out air-conditioned restaurants with chilly drinks.
foggy_light_hot_evening: Misty warmth lingering. Evening stroll in light and breezy clothing.
foggy_light_hot_night: Warm fog settling. Open windows for breeze, light bedding and snug pyjamas.
foggy_medium_hot_morning: Warm misty morning. Wake up and plan your day with a cup of coffee.
foggy_medium_hot_noon: Dense humid fog. Sit down and write some fun ideas for the week.
foggy_medium_hot_evening: Thick warm evening mist. Cook light dinner and invite some friends to enjoy the meal.
foggy_medium_hot_night: Muggy fog persists. Gentle stretching, cool herbal tea, restful sleep.
foggy_heavy_hot_morning: Thick humid morning fog. Self-care routine: skincare, stretching, nourishing breakfast.
foggy_heavy_hot_noon: Intensely foggy and hot. Creative time: painting, writing poetry, or making music.
foggy_heavy_hot_evening: Suffocating fog and heat. Light dinner, gentle movement, cooling breathing exercises.
foggy_heavy_hot_night: Heavy humid fog night. Calming bedtime ritual: cool shower, meditation, peaceful sleep.
drizzle_light_mild_morning: If the sun peeks out, you might catch a rainbow!
drizzle_light_mild_noon: Light drizzle creating reflections. Urban photography or café hopping.
drizzle_light_mild_evening: Soft rain at dusk. Romantic walk or window-side dinner date with a loved one.
drizzle_light_mild_night: Raindrops on windows. Journal writing or sketch by candlelight.
drizzle_medium_mild_morning: Steady drizzle. Grab raincoat for farmers market or bookstore browsing.
drizzle_medium_mild_noon: Persistent light rain. Explore indoor markets or art galleries.
drizzle_medium_mild_evening: Cozy drizzle evening. Cook a new recipe while rain taps outside.
drizzle_medium_mild_night: Rhythmic drizzle. Tend to your indoor plants or play an instrument.
drizzle_heavy_mild_morning: Heavy drizzle soaking everything. Bake cinnamon rolls or banana bread.
drizzle_heavy_mild_noon: Continuous drizzle. Movie marathon or organize your photo collection.
drizzle_heavy_mild_evening: Dense drizzle outside. Candlelit dinner and deep conversations.
drizzle_heavy_mild_night: Steady heavy drizzle. Drift to sleep with rain sounds after a long calming bath or shower.
drizzle_light_cold_morning: Cold misty drizzle. Warm breakfast making, organize kitchen drawers, plan nostalgic meals.
drizzle_light_cold_noon: Chilly light rain. Indoor plant care, dust and organize, bake childhood treats.
drizzle_light_cold_evening: Cold drizzle at dusk. Cook warming soup, arrange cozy corner and light candles.
drizzle_light_cold_night: Gentle cold drizzle. Sort old photos and create a photoalbum.
drizzle_medium_cold_morning: Steady cold drizzle. Maybe time to organize closet mindfully before prepare hearty breakfast.
drizzle_medium_cold_noon: Persistent cold rain. Perfect day for creative projects: knitting, painting, reorganize craft supplies or anything you enjoy.
drizzle_medium_cold_evening: Cold drizzle continuing. Make family recipe, share memories, gratitude practice.
drizzle_medium_cold_night: Rhythmic cold drizzle. Creative writing, plan projects, calming bedtime.
drizzle_heavy_cold_morning: Heavy cold drizzle. You deserve to start with a warm bath or shower, and spending extra time getting ready.
drizzle_heavy_cold_noon: Continuous cold rain outeside means deep clean one room, nostalgic baking or music listening.
drizzle_heavy_cold_evening: Dense cold drizzle. Candlelit elaborate dinner with some friends and storytelling - cozy atmosphere.
drizzle_heavy_cold_night: Steady heavy cold rain. Bring extra blankets and favorite books to bed - a peaceful sleep routine.
drizzle_light_freezing_morning: Freezing mist forming. Make vegetable soup and watch comfort films.
drizzle_light_freezing_noon: Icy drizzle coating surfaces. Visit heated museum or cozy bookshop café.
drizzle_light_freezing_evening: Freezing mist settling. Board games like Scrabble with hot mulled cider.
drizzle_light_freezing_night: Delicate ice crystals forming. Read mystery novel under the warm duvet.
drizzle_medium_freezing_morning: Freezing drizzle coating everything. Use the morning to do something useful and practical
drizzle_medium_freezing_noon: Slippery icy conditions. Library visit or browse indoor shopping arcade.
drizzle_medium_freezing_evening: Ice building slowly outside? Cosy pillow forts building inside.
drizzle_medium_freezing_night: Steady icing drizzle - Pick a favorite podcast and fall asleep to.
drizzle_heavy_freezing_morning: Freezy morning drizzle means baking warm bread inside.
drizzle_heavy_freezing_noon: Significant ice on roads. Puzzle building or organize closets at home.
drizzle_heavy_freezing_evening: Treacherous icy conditions. Hot chocolate bar with family game night.
drizzle_heavy_freezing_night: Heavy ice persisting. Extra quilts, sleep with heating on.
drizzle_light_hot_morning: If the sun peeks out, you might catch a rainbow!
drizzle_light_hot_noon: If the sun peeks out, you might catch a rainbow!
drizzle_light_hot_evening: A little drizzle doesn't mean you can enjoy an energetic walk in the woods
drizzle_light_hot_night: Light drizzle night - invite some friends over for some boardgames and snacks.
drizzle_medium_hot_morning: Dense warm drizzle - find an outdoor swimming pool and enjoy a morning swim
drizzle_medium_hot_noon: Warm summer rain means visit aquarium, art gallery, or indoor climbing.
drizzle_medium_hot_evening: Afternoon drizzle means cooking a light dinner and spend some time with a creative project.
drizzle_medium_hot_night: Let the warm drizzle be your white noise as you drift off to sleep.
drizzle_heavy_hot_morning: Humid morning might be better with some low-fi tunes from a stereo and quiet book reading, crosswords or making breakfast
drizzle_heavy_hot_noon: Hot drizzle feels like tropical rain. Bring out the unopened puzzle or unread book, or learn new skill online.
drizzle_heavy_hot_evening: Heavy humid rain means board games with cold snacks or movie night with friends.
drizzle_heavy_hot_night: Heavy drizzle continues into the night. Light reading, meditation, or plan tomorrow's adventures before bed.
